languages.text: {n}Когда техножрец замечает Паскаля, его глаза широко распахиваются. В то же мгновение из вокс-устройства вырывается лязгающая бинарная тирада — она становится то тише, то громче и длится мучительно долго. Наконец закончив, слуга Омниссии склоняет голову в почтительном поклоне.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда техножрец замечает Паскаля, его глаза широко распахиваются. В то же мгновение из вокс-устройства вырывается неблагозвучная бинарная тирада — она становится то тише, то громче и длится мучительно долго. Наконец закончив, техножрец склоняет голову в почтительном поклоне.{/n}

languages.text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда техножрец замечает Паскаля, его глаза широко распахиваются. В то же мгновение из вокс-устройства вырывается лязгающая бинарная тирада — она становится то тише, то громче и длится мучительно долго. Наконец закончив, слуга Омниссии склоняет голову в почтительном поклоне.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. Immediately, his vox lets out a clanging binary tirade. It lasts painfully long, growing louder one moment and softer the next. When it's finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in reverence.{/n}

{n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. Immediately, his vox lets out a clanging binary tirade. It lasts painfully long, growing louder one moment and softer the next. When it's finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in reverence.{/n}

{n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. Immediately, his vox unit lets out a clanging binary tirade. It lasts painfully long, its volume jumping up and down. When it's finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in reverence.{/n}

{n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. Immediately, his vox unit lets out a clanging binary tirade. It lasts painfully long, its volume jumping up and down. When it's finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in reverence.{/n}

{n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binary, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

{n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binary, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als der Techpriester Pasqal bemerkt, weiten sich seine Augen. Seine Vox-Einheit stößt augenblicklich eine kreischende binhäre Tirade aus, deren Lautstärke scheinbar zufällig anschwillt und verebbt. Als das quälende Spektakel endlich vorbei ist, neigt der Diener des Omnissiah unterwürfig den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als der Techpriester Pasqal bemerkt, weiten sich seine Augen. Seine Vox-Einheit stößt augenblicklich eine klirrende binhäre Tirade aus. Es dauert schmerzhaft lange, die Lautstärke steigt immer wieder an und fällt wieder ab. Als es endlich vorbei ist, neigt der Diener des Omnissiah ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'il remarque Pasqal, le technoprêtre écarquille les yeux. Son système-vox émet aussitôt un chapelet de hurlements binhaires stridents, une tirade atrocement longue dont le volume varie de façon aléatoire. Lorsqu'il a enfin terminé, le serviteur de l'Omnimessie incline la tête en signe de déférence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'il remarque Pasqal, le technoprêtre écarquille les yeux. Immédiatement, son système-vox émet une tirade binhaire bruyante, qui dure effroyablement longtemps, son volume oscillant rapidement. Lorsqu'il a enfin terminé, le serviteur de l'Omnimessie incline la tête en signe de déférence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当这位技术神甫注意到帕斯卡时，他睁大了眼睛，音阵单元立刻发出了一段铿锵的二进制致辞，致辞十分冗长，还带着毫无规律的起伏。说完这一大串话之后，欧姆尼塞亚的这位仆人恭敬地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当这位技术祭司注意到帕斯卡时，他睁大了眼睛，音阵单元立刻发出了一段铿锵的二进制致辞，十分冗长而又抑扬顿挫。说完这一大段之后，欧姆尼塞亚的这位仆人恭敬地低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}技術司祭はパスカルに気づくと目を見開いた。すぐに司祭のヴォクスユニットが、けたたましく2進数の激しい演説を発する。それはあまりに長く、音量は上下に揺れた。やっと演説が終わると、万機神の従者は敬意を表して頭を下げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭はパスカルに気づくと目を見開いた。すぐに司祭のヴォクスユニットが、けたたましく2進数の激しい演説を発する。それはあまりに長く、音量は上下に揺れた。やっと演説が終わると、万機神の従者は敬意を表して頭を下げた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando el tecnosacerdote se fija en Pasqal, sus ojos se abren de par en par. Inmediatamente, su unidad voco emite una estridente cantinela binaria, cuyo volumen sube y baja a saltos. Cuando por fin termina, el sirviente del Omnissiah inclina la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando el Tecnosacerdote se fija en Pasqal, sus ojos se abren de par en par. Inmediatamente, su unidad voco emite una estridente cantinela binaria. Dura demasiado, su volumen sube y baja a saltos. Cuando por fin termina, el sirviente del Omnissiah inclina la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in gözleri, Pasqal'ı fark ettiğinde fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Sesin rastgele yükselip alçaldığı, ikili dilde ve acı veren uzunlukta, bitmek bilmeyen bir tirad, voks ünitesinden dizi hâlinde feryat figan dökülüyor. Nihayet bittiğindeyse Hermesih'in hizmetkârı hürmetle başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When the Tech-Priest notices Pasqal, his eyes widen. His vox-unit immediately lets out a string of screeching binharic, a tortuously long tirade in which the volume rises and falls seemingly at random. When it is finally over, the Omnissiah's servant bows his head in deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in gözleri, Pasqal'ı fark ettiğinde fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Sesin rastgele yükselip alçaldığı, ikili dilde ve acı veren uzunlukta, bitmek bilmeyen bir tirad, voks ünitesinden dizi hâlinde feryat figan dökülüyor. Nihayet bittiğindeyse Hermesih'in hizmetkârı hürmetle başını eğiyor.{/n}
